block.p: A selective listing of state, county and local government events across New Jersey this week. (All dates and times subject to confirmation.) Items should be submitted by mail at least three weeks in advance to the New Jersey Op-Ed Page, The New York Times, 229 West 43rd Street, New York, N.Y. 10036, or by e-mail to njcivic@nytimes.com.
State of New Jersey

Newark Board of Public Utilities. Wednesday at 10 a.m. Board hearing room, eighth floor, 2 Gateway Center. (973) 648-2026. Trenton Pension and Health Benefits Review Commission. Friday at 10 a.m. Division of Pensions and Benefits, 50 West State Street. (609) 292-4840.
Atlantic County

Buena Planning/Zoning Board. Thursday at 7 p.m. Buena Vista Township Municipal Building, 890 Harding Highway. (856) 697-2100. Hamilton Township Council. Tuesday at 8 p.m. Hamilton Municipal Building, 2090 Greenwood Avenue. (609) 890-3622. Ventnor Board of Commissioners. Thursday at 6 p.m. Ventnor Municipal Building, 6201 Atlantic Avenue. (609) 823-7904.
Bergen County

Bergenfield Mayor and Council. Tuesday at 8 p.m. Bergenfield Borough Hall, 198 North Washington Avenue. (201) 387-4055. Dumont Mayor and Council. Wednesday at 7:30 p.m. Dumont Borough Hall, 50 Washington Avenue. (201) 387-5022 .
Essex County
Bloomfield Township Council. Tuesday at 7:30 p.m. Law Enforcement Building, 1 Municipal Plaza. (973) 680-4015. Verona Town Council. Tuesday at 7 p.m. Town Hall, 600 Bloomfield Avenue. (973) 239-9000.
Gloucester County
Pitman Chamber of Commerce. Tuesday at 6:30 p.m. Pitman Municipal Building, 110 South Broadway. (856) 589-3522.
Hudson County
Guttenberg Planning/Zoning Board. Thursday at 7:30 p.m. Guttenberg Town Hall, 6808 Park Avenue. (201) 868-2315.
Hunterdon County

Flemington Library Commission. Tuesday at 10 a.m. Hunterdon County Library, 314 Route 12. (908) 788-1444. Flemington Committee on Disability Services. Tuesday at 10 a.m. Main Street County Complex, Building 1, Route 12. (908) 788-1253. Glen Gardner Township Committee. Wednesday at 7 p.m. Lebanon Township Hall, 530 West Hill Road. (908) 638-8523.
Mercer County
Trenton City Council. Thursday at 5:30 p.m. Trenton City Hall, 319 East State Street. (609) 989-3187.
Morris County

Morristown Youth Services Advisory Committee. Thursday at 2 p.m. Human Services Building, 340 West Hanover Avenue. (973) 326-7270. Morristown Senior Citizen and Disabled Residents Transportation Advisory Committee. Thursday at 1:30 p.m. 30 Schuyler Place. (973) 326-7270. Randolph County College Board of Trustees. Wednesday at 7 p.m. Henderson Hall, Route 10 and Center Grove Road. (973) 328-5000.
Passaic County

Clifton Zoning Board. Wednesday at 7 p.m. Clifton Municipal Building, 900 Clifton Avenue. (973) 470-5757. Clifton City Council. Tuesday at 8 p.m. Clifton Municipal Building, 900 Clifton Avenue. (973) 470-5824. Wayne Township Council. Wednesday at 8 p.m. Wayne Town Hall, 475 Valley Road. (973) 694-1800.
Somerset County

Belle Mead Zoning Board. Tuesday at 7:30 p.m. Montgomery Township Municipal Building, 2261 Van Horne Road, Route 206 North. (908) 359-8211. Belle Mead Environmental Commission. Tuesday at 7:30 p.m. Montgomery Township Municipal Building, 2261 Van Horne Road, Route 206 North. (908) 359-8211. Millstone Rabies clinic. Saturday at 7 p.m. Millstone Department of Public Works garage, 899 Perrineville Road. (732) 446-6774.
Union County

Berkeley Heights Planning Board reorganization. Wednesday at 7:30 p.m. Berkeley Heights, 29 Park Avenue. (908) 464-2700. Springfield Environmental Commission. Monday at 8 p.m. Township of Springfield Municipal Building, 100 Mountain Avenue. (973) 912-2200.
Warren County

Alpha Planning Board. Wednesday at 7:30 p.m. Alpha Municipal Building, 1001 East Boulevard. (908) 454-5348. Hackettstown Board of Health. Wednesday at 7:30 p.m. Hackettstown Municipal Building, 215 Stiger Street. (908) 850-0660. Hardwick Township Committee. Wednesday at 7 p.m. Hardwick Municipal Building, 40 Spring Valley Road. (908) 362-6528. Washington Township Committee. Wednesday at 7:30 p.m. Washington Township Administrative Offices, 350 Route 57 West. (908) 689-7200.
